document.full_text: prime minister manmohan singh said he had no alternative but to send police to forcibly end a peaceful anti-graft protest by a popular yoga guru and thousands of his followers.
document.title: asia: india: premier defends raid on anticorruption protest
lines_and_colors: prime minister manmohan singh said he had no alternative but to send police to forcibly end a peaceful anti-graft protest by a popular yoga guru and thousands of his followers.
